name: Satyagraha: Episode One
description:
Satyagraha is a stealth game fused with an interactive story which introduces the player to the concept of non-violent resistance.

It's a prototype, currently still in development and created for #ResistJam 2017.

Aesthetically, I took my inspiration from Sin City and Film Noir cinema.

I'd really love to develop this one further into a series of episodes so any contributions that you make will be greatly appreciated. Why not "buy" me a coffee by supporting me with a donation? Creating games as a solo developer is hard work and I'd love to be able to afford to do this full time, as well as pay a Programmer and additional team members one day. Until then, it's just me doing everything and my programming hat doesn't fit me very well!

This project uses several public domain images, sounds, music, and 3D assets from the Unity Asset Store to streamline development since it's a week long jam. Please see the Attribution text bundled with the game for source details and a big thank-you to all the authors of these assets. I couldn't have made this prototype in a week without you.

Here's some handy tips :

Move : W A S D

Run : Shift + W A S D

Spacebar : Jump / Select

Mouse : Look around / Left click - Select

** The gameplay scenes take a while to load. I'm hoping to fix that in future updates. Until then, please be patient when scenes are loading.
